sn46.38:1.1: Yasmiṃ, bhikkhave, samaye ariyasāvako aṭṭhiṃ katvā manasi katvā sabbaṃ cetaso samannāharitvā ohitasoto dhammaṃ suṇāti, imassa pañca nīvaraṇā tasmiṃ samaye na honti. Satta bojjhaṅgā tasmiṃ samaye bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchanti.
sn46.38:2.1: Katame pañca nīvaraṇā tasmiṃ samaye na honti?
sn46.38:2.2: Kāmacchandanīvaraṇaṃ tasmiṃ samaye na hoti, byāpādanīvaraṇaṃ tasmiṃ samaye na hoti, thinamiddhanīvaraṇaṃ tasmiṃ samaye na hoti, uddhaccakukkuccanīvaraṇaṃ tasmiṃ samaye na hoti, vicikicchānīvaraṇaṃ tasmiṃ samaye na hoti.
sn46.38:2.3: Imassa pañca nīvaraṇā tasmiṃ samaye na honti.
sn46.38:3.1: Katame satta bojjhaṅgā tasmiṃ samaye bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchanti?
sn46.38:3.2: Satisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṃ samaye bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchati …pe… upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo tasmiṃ samaye bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchati.
sn46.38:3.3: Ime satta bojjhaṅgā tasmiṃ samaye bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchanti.
sn46.38:3.4: Yasmiṃ, bhikkhave, samaye ariyasāvako aṭṭhiṃ katvā manasi katvā sabbaṃ cetaso samannāharitvā ohitasoto dhammaṃ suṇāti, imassa pañca nīvaraṇā tasmiṃ samaye na honti. Ime satta bojjhaṅgā tasmiṃ samaye bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchantī”ti.
